fields.name: PCR
fields.description: Power Control PCR must not change from power-down request (pdn_req) assertion until the target subsystem is completely powered up

enumeratedValues.name: PCR_0
enumeratedValues.description: Do not switch off power even if pdn_req is asserted.

enumeratedValues.name: PCR_1
enumeratedValues.description: Switch off power when pdn_req is asserted.

registers.name: MEGA_PUPSCR
registers.description: PGC Mega Power Up Sequence Control Register

fields.name: SW
fields.description: After a power-up request (pup_req assertion), the PGC waits a number of IPG clocks equal to the value of SW before asserting power toggle on/off signal (switch_b) to switch on power

fields.name: SW2ISO
fields.description: After asserting power toggle on/off signal (switch_b) to switch on power, the PGC waits a number of IPG clocks equal to the value of SW2ISO before negating isolation

registers.name: MEGA_PDNSCR
registers.description: PGC Mega Pull Down Sequence Control Register

fields.name: ISO
fields.description: After a power-down request (pdn_req assertion), the PGC waits a number of IPG clocks equal to the value of ISO before asserting isolation

fields.name: ISO2SW
fields.description: After asserting isolation, the PGC waits a number of IPG clocks equal to the value of ISO2SW before negating power toggle on/off signal (switch_b) to switch off power

registers.name: MEGA_SR
registers.description: PGC Mega Power Gating Controller Status Register

enumeratedValues.name: PSR_0
enumeratedValues.description: The target subsystem was not powered down for the previous power-down request.

enumeratedValues.name: PSR_1
enumeratedValues.description: The target subsystem was powered down for the previous power-down request.
